__e: What do I care about her annulment?
If you leave now, I promise to tell... no ODE.
Well, like you say, I've changed me tune. People do. Not without a reason.
You three are the only ones left alive and two of you entered the tomb like the others.
If her sons succeeded in killing me... She would be spared, but it's...
I just wish we'd found them sooner. We could've saved so many lives.
Was I not right to think that you would stop at nothing to spare yourself above everything and everyone else?
And don't think for a second that just because they're coming after me, they won't come after you and all your people.
But you have a wife, children, whether their lives are spared depends on you.
Between us, everything goes. But we don't mess with our families.
I don't know, but who would leave them out.
And yet, I am fully resolved to spare her life.
